summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganExperience the Mindful Bubble Cleanse, a gentle yet effective deep cleanser from Chasin' Rabbits that is perfect for all skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis cleanser not only hydrates and soothes but also replenishes skin with essential minerals and nutrients for a healthy glowFormulated with mildly acidic micro-bubbles and activated charcoal powder, it effortlessly removes dirt, unclogs pores, and exfoliates dead skin cells for a refreshed, purified complexionKey IngredientsActivated Charcoal - Absorbs toxins, impurities, and excess oil, potentially helping to shrink poresBamboo water - Assists in reducing inflammation and soothing irritated skinFormulated WithoutAlcoholSulfatesParabensItem 2645083How To UseCreate foam by rubbing cleanser with damp hands, then massage gently over skin avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly.IngredientsWater, Coco-Betaine, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sorbitol, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Glycerin, Lauryl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Propanediol, Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Bambusa Vulgaris Water, Charcoal Powder, Panthenol, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Oil, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf/Stem Extract, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Hexylene Glycol, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Beta-Glucan, Vaccinium Myrtillus Fruit Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Create foam by rubbing cleanser with damp hands, then massage gently over skin avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly.

reviews.headline: My skin type, V SENSITIVE, OILY, & dehydrated.
reviews.comments: Not gonna lie i have tried everything, peach & lily for over a year & it stopped working, ive tried Laroche Posay, SoonJung, anything you can think of ive tried. I stumbled across this & i was like, im tired of being let down so i was hesitant. I get cystic acne, blackheads, etc, super sensitive skin, oily & on the dehydrated side. Ive used this for 2-3 weeks & see the biggest difference in my face. My skin is soft, not steipped, black heads on my nose.. gone, pores have shrunk. Im starting to feel beautiful again because of it, my skin has always been a huge insecurity for me. If your skin sounds anything like mine, & youre hesitantâ€¦ just take the chance. I also bought the mushroom skin toner to pair with it- & cut all other products out. Not to mention it has no harsh chemicals in it at all. New holy grail.
